title: The Light
description: And then Life “No more.”Our time may be done.No longer does Man sit upon the heady heights of creation.Another walks amongst us.More powerful. More intelligent. Senses perfectly attuned. For the Light is a predator.And what is this creature’s prey?It is Us.The Lights are here and we are their nourishment.Small in number as they struggle to gain a foothold on earth. Their quest has ultimate feed on the human race and breed for the longevity of their kind.And then there is ‘she’. She who knows not what she is. She who doesn't fit in. She who chooses self-destruction and she who will determine our destiny.But there is one who can see the Lights. Is this our redeemer? For the Hunter is their equal in every way. He kills them for pleasure, for glory, for he knows nothing else. But his violence knows no end. His brutality knows no boundaries.So who is the monster, you ask? The Light, the Hunter, She…..But it was Life that “No more.”
author: Richard Slater
